geneticAlogrithm

Class SequenceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uncommons.watchmaker.framework.factories.AbstractCandidateFactory<Sequence>
      • geneticAlogrithm.SequenceFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.uncommons.watchmaker.framework.CandidateFactory<Sequence>

    public class SequenceFactory
extends org.uncommons.watchmaker.framework.factories.AbstractCandidateFactory<Sequence>

    Class which define a Factory for the Sequence Object.
    As it is say in the Sequence documentation, you are not suppose to instantiate it yourself, the Ga will do it,using this factory.
    you had to implement it to use the watchmer's GA algorithm. The Ga will generate random candidates using this factory
    For more details, look at the watchmaker API

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Pierre-Yves Hervo
    See Also:
    GeneticAlgorithmCall

    • Method Detail

      • generateRandomCandidate

        public Sequence generateRandomCandidate(java.util.Random rng)
        Method overWrited from watchMaker's API AbstractCrossover class. It allow the GA to generate random candidates. For more information, see watchmaker's API. This method affect the values of the different alpahbets to the different box of the sequence values. It is necessaary to define it manually because it depend of the lenght of the sequence, he number of alphabets and the position of each vocal element in the script.
        Parameters:
        rng - a random generator
        Returns:
        A new Sequence
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        AbstractCandidateFactory, MessageToPraat.writePraatScriptWithCandidates(Sequence)
